text:
The #Pinellas Co. school board did the same today, submitting a letter to @GovRonDeSantis requesting he prioritize educators for the #COVID19 #vaccine since his policies require schools to remain open. 

Read the letter ➡️ https://t.co/DOMsSDgsRz @10TampaBay https://t.co/BV6dT22Uea https://t.co/8Ta4AqKojF
